text: The Precious Seed () is a 1948 Soviet drama movie directed by Iosif Kheifits and Aleksandr Zarkhi.Биография Александра ЗархиДрагоценные зерна (1948) It stars Galina Kozhakina, Boris Zhukovsky, and Oleg Zhakov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1948 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Iosif Kheifits Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Zarkhi Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Precious Seed
